name: The Truthseeker's Quest Proof of Concept
name_original: The Truthseeker's Quest Proof of Concept
description:
A presentation of the early stages of a game I am currently working on, "The Truthseeker's Quest (Working Title)".
Use of a controller is highly recommended.

Keyboard Controls are as follows:
Arrow Keys <> -  Move left and right
Spacebar - Jump
D - Regular Attack.  W - Power attack.  A - Dodge. S - Guard 

Shift - Enter Sagesight Mode

Shift + D - Activate Charge Skill [Currently Chain platforms]. Shift + W - Activate 'Pattern' Skill

Important note: Holding one of the triggers puts you in the SageSight state, which changes what the other buttons do. it needs to be held down (noted by the bar visible) to take effect.

  • Known Bugs:
    • Certain abilities (Guarding, using certain skills) cause brief framedrops.
    • Use of the keyboard makes the animations not transition correctly.
  • Next Goals:
    • (Throughout)Work on Known Bugs
    • Add Enemy healthbars to the game
    • Adjust controls to be smoother and more dynamic
